title: How to Do the Moon Phase Soulmate Test on TikTok

steps.title: Search for the “Moon Phase Test” effect on your TikTok app.
steps.content: Search for the “Moon Phase Test” effect on your TikTok app. Find the effect with TikTok’s search function, then tap the “Use this effect” button to open the video recording screen and add the effect to a video.

steps.title: Enter yours and someone else’s birthdays into the effect.
steps.content: Enter yours and someone else’s birthdays into the effect. Input your own birthday, plus that of your partner, best friend, a celebrity, or even a stranger.

steps.title: Hit record to see your soulmate compatibility.
steps.content: Hit record to see your soulmate compatibility. The effect will show you how the 2 moon phases on your birthdays align, showing you your supposed soulmate compatibility. The closer the phases line up like puzzle pieces, the more compatible you’re said to be. Note that only a few phases match up perfectly: A full moon matches a new moon, a waning gibbous with a waxing crescent, a third quarter with a first quarter, and a waning crescent with a waxing gibbous.

steps.title: New Moon:
steps.content: New Moon: Astrologer and counselor Stina Garbis says, “The new moon is when things are beginning.” Like the new moon, you’re full of possibilities and bright futures. You savor fresh starts, especially in relationships, but have higher standards for commitment and seek a love that allows for independence.

steps.title: Waxing Crescent:
steps.content: Waxing Crescent: You’re forward-looking, with your eyes set on your ambitions. You’re an assertive trailblazer who makes their own way and introduces new ideas. You know exactly what you want out of love, and you’ll recognize that love when you see it. The trick is waiting for it.

steps.title: First Quarter:
steps.content: First Quarter: You have enough experience to make you cautious about both love and life, but that caution has also raised your standards. Your perfect match is someone who pulls you outside your comfort zone, and with whom you can grow together.

steps.title: Waxing Gibbous:
steps.content: Waxing Gibbous: A waxing gibbous appears bright and nearly complete. [1] X Research source You, too, are always on the verge of a breakthrough—in love and in life in general. Often, other people are the secret ingredient for that breakthrough to happen. You’re an excellent collaborator and an even better ally and friend.

steps.title: Full Moon:
steps.content: Full Moon: Psychic astrologer Stina Garbis says, “A full moon… has the strongest gravitational pull on the earth, making everything from the tide to emotions, to desires and attractions at [their] strongest.”Similarly, you’re ruled by your emotions, and you feel them deeply. This makes you something of a hopeless romantic, and you tend to fall for a new person each day. One day, though, the perfect person will come.

steps.title: Waning Gibbous:
steps.content: Waning Gibbous: You’ve seen the harder side of love, and now your perspective is more logical and level-headed. You’re careful about who you trust, but when you do find a friend or romantic partner who clicks, you know you’ve made a bond for life.

steps.title: Last Quarter:
steps.content: Last Quarter: Equal parts reckless and laid-back, you have a relaxed take on love and life that others find alluring. Your heart is wild and often leads you to new places, both good and bad, but you know it’ll always guide you on to the next chapter, as well.

steps.title: Waning Crescent:
steps.content: Waning Crescent: You’re an old soul with many trips around the sun. You have no illusions about love or life, and you see and accept things as they are. You’re a peaceful and reliable presence to your friends and partners, and many depend on you in times of trouble.

steps.title: Enter your birthdate into a moon phase calendar site.
steps.content: Enter your birthdate into a moon phase calendar site. Visit a site like MoonPhases and use the calendar to find out what phase the moon was in when you were born. Or enter your birthday into a site like StarDate to get automatic results. [2] X Research source Take note of your phase, then enter the birthdate of your potential soulmate and compare the two. The closer they fit like puzzle pieces, the greater your compatibility may be!
